Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix™ Automated Microbiology System Daptomycin (0.125-32 μg/mL) - Gram-Positive ID/AST
BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System for use with the antimicrobial agent Daptomycin (0.125-32 μg/mL) - Gram positive ID/AST or AST only Phoenix Panels
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Specimen Type(s): Isolates from pure culture of aerobic and facultative anaerobic Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria of human origin
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System using Daptomycin for Gram-positive bacterial antimicrobial susceptibility testing
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by minimal inhibitory concentration of most Gram-positive bacterial isolates from pure culture belonging to the genera Staphylococcus and Enterococcus
